page.title: 11Riding around my house
page.content: When I go out for a ride I sometimes go on the roads. I try to avoid going on the roads, because they are narrow and windy and some people drive too fast. The farmers have shut up some of the bridle paths. So are some of the tracks . When I go out riding in the summer there is a big chicken farm and a lot of flies swarwm around there and my pony gets itchy. If I'm allowed to, I go riding in the woods around our house. I see a lot of wild life around our area.I see animals as such as foxes, birds, deer, pheasants and badgers on the Downs. There is a valley called Hidden Valley which has an old broken-down house in it.
